snippet.title: Meridian 157: Chapter 1 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Meridian 157: Chapter 1, available on iOS, Android, Amazon and Steam

Available on:
-iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/meridian-157-chapter-1/id1484024784
-Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.novasoftinteractive.Meridian_157_Chapter_1&hl=en_CA&gl=US
-Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1458920/Meridian_157_Chapter_1/
-Amazon app store: https://www.amazon.ca/dp/B07ZR8KGF7/ref=sr_1_2?qid=1572655526&refinements=p_4%3ANovaSoft+Interactive+Ltd&s=mobile-apps&search-type=ss&sr=1-2
